txt.en: 'With that green lamp, you should be able to reveal the dwarf-doors hidden in this region. One of them is marked on my map as Khibir-zamu - and it lies somewhere along the tunnels in the western section of the Silvertine Lodes.'
'The secrets of Khibir-zamu will soon reveal themselves to my scouts. Once they have, I am sure there will be much to do within.'
'I'm sorry, [placeholder] -- the doors were well hidden for a reason, and the maps marking their location are inexact. You will have to find it on your own.'
HIDING CONTENT - DNT - Dwarven Doors: Khibir-zamu
Styrr has rebuilt an ancient green dwarf-lamp for you. He told you that this lamp will reveal the hidden door to Khibir-zamu in the Silvertine Lodes.
The hidden door to Khibir-zamu is somewhere within the western tunnels of the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nStyrr has asked you to find the hidden dwarf-door.
Talk to Styrr at the Deep Descent
Styrr can be found at the Deep Descent within the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should return to Styrr at and tell him you have located Khibir-zamu.
